subject: Track and Field
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt said that antidoping officials sent a “bad message to the sport” after the American sprinter Tyson Gay received only a one-year ban after a positive test for an anabolic steroid.
snippet: Usain Bolt said that antidoping officials sent a “bad message to the sport” after the American sprinter Tyson Gay received only a one-year ban after a positive test for an anabolic steroid.
